name: gill solway
text: Liam did a really good job cleaning our roof of moss and debris, he arrived on time and worked right through the day. He ensured that any mess was cleared up and wipe down any window sills by any debris. He was polite and knowledgeable and I have booked him to clean the patios. Always returned calls as soon as he could. Can‚Äôt fault him. The pboto shows the difference between two roofs of the same age

text: Liam arrived on time and explained how the roof was to be cleaned he did a really good job of clearing the moss followed by treatment he left the area clean and tidy highly recommend

text: Liam was brilliant, came to clean the gutters and done a great job! Very clean and tidy and professional! Will be having LRS back again! Thank you 5 stars ‚≠êÔ∏è‚≠êÔ∏è‚≠êÔ∏è‚≠êÔ∏è‚≠êÔ∏è

name: Jordan Samuels
text: Never used before. Rang him on the Friday. Came round Sunday morning and cleaned gutters that hadn‚Äôt been cleaned til I could eat off of them. Only took a few hours aswell!! Will defo use again in the future.

name: Richard Pearson
text: LRS exteriors completed some gutter cleaning for our 2 storey house with an awkward to reach gutter at the rear. The communication was great throughout, Liam arrived on time and completed the work in a professional manner, leaving no mess behind and some nice clean guttering. Reasonable price too. Would recommend and definitely use again

name: Barnaby Crocker
text:
Our poor house had been battered over the last few years with all sorts of dirt from building work next door...it was in a VERY sorry state. Ahead of a full re-paint in 2025, we wanted to get it cleaned.
I found Liam by chance online, and I'm thrilled I did.
He came and spent 2 days giving the whole house a thorough exterior clean (render, soffits, gutters, windows). He did several treatments and the results are transformational.
Liam was so nice, he explained everything really well, and took great care. We're delighted, and will 100% be having him back for any other jobs.
We can't recommend LRS highly enough.

name: Richard John Boy
text: Absolutely stellar job. Really happy with the result- looks brand new. Excellent customer care as well. The boy‚Äôs gonna go far

name: Lucy Vowles
text: Liam did a very thorough job. Very impressed. Highly recommended, will use again.

name: Jeds Mitson
text:
Very pleased with my exterior clean today! Makes the house look new again would reccomend Liam
Many thanks again
Jess

name: Leni Sutherland
text: I had Liam (from LRS Exterior Cleaning) clean my roof of the moss that was always making a mess and he did an incredible job especially considering it was difficult at the rear of the property because of a funny shaped conservatory.  I would highly recommend him!  I will be using his services again in the Spring to clean my drive as his videos show an amazing difference once he's been!

name: Simon Jackson
text:
We recently had LRS clean our roof prior to having new windows etc. fitted.
From initial contact until completion, the whole process was painless.
Liam and Josh both worked like trojans for 2 days to complete the job and the attention to detail was excellent. They actually left our property tidier than when they started!
100% recommend LRS to anyone for any exterior cleaning you need.
Thanks again Liam üòä

name: E Bartholomew
text:
An amazing service by a super chap! Liam was given very short notice to help us out with cleaning our incredibly dirty conservatory, ready for a garden party we were hosting.
He came up trumps! He squeezed us in and did an incredible job! Our conservatory looks brand new!
We are so grateful!! We will definitely be using his services again!!

name: Zach
text:
Had been looking at getting my driveway replaced as I previously assumed it to be in an unredeemable state. But was recommended Liam by a family member to try a cleaning first. I was absolutely blown away by the results, the driveway looks completely new again after looking almost apocalyptic.
Will be using this company for all future cleaning jobs, highly recommend!

name: Peter Gooding
text: Cleaned out drive amazing results. Excellent service, very professional would certainly recommend.

name: Greg Thomson
text:
From the start to the finish every thing was done so well. Work started on time and finished when Liam was satisfied that it was done to his high standard. He even returned after completing the job to help me put the garden furniture etc back .
I am delighted with how good the roof and the block paving looks now. A job well done.

text:
omg you have got to use this company for any of your exterior cleaning needs

name: Kevin Brown
text: Liam did a fantastic job re-pointing and cleaning our patio, he was very professional and would highly recommend him. Thank you Liam

text:
We have a three story house, and pleased with the efficiency and time Liam took . Overcoming the challenges of the house's awkward area's.  Well done to a very polite younge man. Happy to recommend LRS Exterior Cleaning

name: Annie Lang
text:
I would recommend Liam as he was polite, thorough and professional. I felt looked after as he explained the work and took care of my plants and fishpond. I am pleased with the results to my house and drive.
He was good with the paperwork and replying to emails too.

name: Steven Sellek
text: Excellent communication, job well done, highly recommended.

name: Maisie Buckingham
text: Our conservatory roof looks brand new again! We‚Äôre so pleased to have a nice clean roof. A thorough job was done, not one bit missed. Would 100% recommend!

name: Donna Harris
text:
I was very happy with the service I received. Quick to respond to enquiry, provide quote and carry out work within a week. Polite, tidy work. Would definitely recommend.

Service provided: gutter clearing and window cleaning.

name: Taylor Preston
text: Very professional worker, really reliable would definitely recommend him

name: Oliver Norris
text: Liam came and cleaned all our gutters and fascias. They were blocked and overflowing and he did a top job of cleaning them out and cleaning the fascias. Would definitely have him back to them again.

name: Linda Mary
text: Liam did a brilliant job on our terrace, bringing out the beautiful sandy colour of the original, York stones. He was efficient, professional and cooperatve throughout the process, working hard in difficult weather conditions to complete the job on time.

name: Emma Preston
text: Liam made a lovely job of our driveway, windows and fascias thoroughly recommend him.

name: Amy Scrutton
text: Liam did an amazing job of my windows and conservatory was a big job as hadn‚Äôt been cleaned for a while. Looks brand new now. Would highly recommend his work.

name: Kate Millin
text: Liam has done such a good job on my caravan decking that it looks like it has just been put up. He worked hard and has done a brilliant job.

name: Mike Carran
text: LRS cleaned my drive and front of my house. They left it looking immaculate and barely recognisable from how it looked beforehand. They were knowledgeable, helpful, professional and i could not recommend them enough.
